free_text.Learning outcomes: The purpose of this working group is to allow the participants to familiarize themselves with recent important advances in algebraic topology.  Participants take turns reading and presenting papers related to the current theme of the working group.
free_text.Content: The theme of the working group varies from year to year.  Examples of recent topics studied include: Galois theory of ring spectra, duality in algebra and topology, and topological algebraic geometry.
free_text.Note: Talks in the working group can be given in French or English.

free_text.Remarque: Talks in the working group can be given in French or English.
